lead_paragraph: Janet Yellen’s testimony before a House committee highlighted how real debate about the economy has been overshadowed by partisan politics.

headline.print_headline: On Capitol Hill, Partisan Heat, Not Economic Light
headline.main: On Capitol Hill, Yellen Finds Partisan Heat, Not Economic Light

snippet: Janet Yellen’s testimony before a House committee highlighted how real debate about the economy has been overshadowed by partisan politics.
abstract: News Analysis; questioning during Federal Reserve chairwoman Janet L Yellen's Congressional testimony borders on theater, as conservative lawmakers attempt to score political points at expense of rational economic discourse.
